EntryName	MPP2_HUMAN
ProteinName	MAGUK p55 subfamily member 2 (Discs large homolog 2) (Protein MPP2)
GeneName	MPP2 DLG2
Length	413
Function	Postsynaptic MAGUK scaffold protein that links CADM1 cell adhesion molecules to core components of the postsynaptic density (By similarity). In CA1 pyramidal neurons, required for synaptic KCNN2-containing channel function and long-term potentiation expression (By similarity). Seems to negatively regulate SRC function in epithelial cells (PubMed:19665017).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Membrane; Cell projection; Dendrite; Postsynaptic density
Disorder
